content: Sometimes I wonder where they are now and what kind of lives they're living...

Maybe it's time to give them a call,
just to check in?
<size=30>...On second thought, never mind.</size>

The seniors at the Qianfeng Association always say,
Though crossing through turbulent winds can be troublesome,
There are many wonderful surprises waiting on the other side!

We need to ensure everyone's living environment is safe,
<size=30>Though, places that are too safe can be quite boring.</size>

If you're feeling bored, come find me!
I'll show you what real dang... no,
I mean, what real adventure looks like!

Mobai says if conditions allow,
he'll build a new station in the future,
then I can take everyone to all sorts of places!

If you don't know what to do, talk to Mobai.
If you want to buy or sell stuff, find Glenn.

There are worlds with flower petals dancing in the sky, worlds with swirling snowflakes,
and even worlds with colorful rivers of sand!
Doesn't that sound like fun?

The Golden Sands family is a lively one.
I have many siblings, and they are all amazing!

Oh, it's <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!
Did you sleep well?
Want to join me for a 300-lap patrol?
